title: SanDisk 128GB Ultra Flair USB 3.0 Flash Drive - SDCZ73-128G-G46
aplus_html:
From the manufacturer


At a Glance:
  • Sleek, durable metal casing
  • Write speeds of up to 15X faster than standard USB 2.0 drives (1).
  • Read speeds of up to 150MB/s (1)
  • Password protection and 128-bit AES encryption software (4)
  • RescuePRO Deluxe data recovery download (5)

SanDisk Ultra Flair USB 3.0 Flash Drive, 128GB

Offering transfer speeds of up to 15X faster than standard USB 2.0 drives (1), the SanDisk Ultra Flair USB 3.0 Flash Drive is designed to move your files fast, so you spend less time waiting. For example, you can transfer a full-length movie in less than 30 seconds (3). The drive’s durable and stylish metal casing keeps your important files safe, while the included SanDisk SecureAccess software lets you password-protect and encrypt your sensitive files (4).

SanDisk products are constructed to the highest standards and rigorously tested. You can be confident in the outstanding quality, performance and reliability of every SanDisk product.

What's in the Box?

  • SanDisk Ultra Flair USB 3.0 Flash Drive
Read more

High-speed USB 3.0 Performance

With write speeds of up to 15X faster than standard USB 2.0 drives (1), you can transfer a full-length movie in less than 30 seconds (3).

Sleek and Durable Metal Casing

The SanDisk Ultra Flair USB 3.0 Flash Drive features a stylish yet tough metal casing that protects the drive from unexpected knocks. A compact design makes it easy to slip the USB flash drive into your pocket, bag, or purse and bring your files with you anywhere.

SanDisk SecureAccess Software Protects Your Privacy

Create a private folder on your drive with SanDisk SecureAccess software (4). This 128-bit AES encryption software makes it easy to password-protect critical files. Drag and drop files into the vault, and they'll be protected.

Read more

Easy File Recovery with RescuePRO Deluxe Software

The drive comes with a RescuePRO Deluxe data recovery software download offer (5). This software makes it easy to recover files that have been accidentally deleted (download required).

Compatible with USB 3.0 and 2.0 Ports

The SanDisk Ultra Flair USB 3.0 Flash Drive is backward-compatible with USB 2.0, so you can plug it into any USB 2.0 or 3.0 port.

Choose the Amount of Storage You Need

The amount of capacity you need depends on the types of files you have, how big they are, and how many there are. The chart above gives you an idea of how many photos, videos, music and office files you can store for each capacity.

Read more

Legal Disclaimers + Warranty

(1) For 32GB – 128GB: Write to drive up to 15 times faster than standard USB 2.0 drives (4MB/s); up to 150MB/s read speed. USB 3.0 port required. Based on internal testing; performance may be lower depending on host device. 1MB=1,000,000 bytes.

For 16GB: Read speeds up to 130MB/s. Write speed lower and varies by capacity. USB 3.0 port required. Based on internal testing; performance may be lower depending upon host device. 1MB = 1,000,000 bytes.

(2) 1GB=1,000,000,000 bytes. Actual user storage less.

(3) Based on 1.2GB MPEG-4 video transfer with USB 3.0 host device. Results may vary based on host device, file attributes and other factors.

(4) Password protection uses 128-bit AES encryption and is supported by Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 and Mac OS X v10.6+ (Software download required for Mac, see SanDisk website for more details).

(5) Registration required; terms and conditions apply.

html_product_description: The SanDisk Ultra Flair USB 3.0 flash drive moves your files fast. Spend less time waiting to transfer files and enjoy high-speed USB 3.0 performance of up to 150MB/s. With transfer speeds to drive up to 15 times faster than standard USB 2.0 drives, you can transfer a full length movie in less than 30 seconds. Its durable and sleek metal casing is tough enough to handle knocks with style. And, with password protection, you can rest assured that your private files stay private. Help secure files in style with the SanDisk Ultra Flair USB 3.0 flash drive.

tag_title: SanDisk 128GB Ultra Flair USB 3.0 Flash Drive - SDCZ73-128G-G46

reviews.title: High Capacity, Small Size; but runs very hot
reviews.content: I've lot count of how many thumb drives I've had in the past 20 years, but this SanDisk unit is a solid design and works well. It is very small, as in fear losing it small (1.75 inches long and 0.5 inches wide) and is a thin metal box with a plastic handle. I admit I removed a single star solely because of just how HOT it gets very quickly. For example, moving 77 megabytes of data to it required 15 seconds; but the metal reached 98 degrees F in that short amount of time. I like how it is small; but I'd accept a larger casing if it cuts the running temperature down.

reviews.title: Great option to expand Sony TV storage
reviews.content: This is an excellent and affordable way to expand your storage on your Sony TVs. If you are getting the annoying "low storage" warning on your TV because Sony doesn't seem to understand that 4GB was acceptable for the year 2000, this flash drive will let you not only move some existing apps from your TV to the flash drive, but to install future apps on your USB drive to keep that low storage warning off your screen.

reviews.title: extremely misleading about size!!!!
reviews.content: they are not 128 gigs!they only hold ~52 gigs!when you put one of them in your usb slot you'll find that  limit statnig 114gigs, but if you try to fill any of them to compacity, you'll find that they hold ~52gbs!these need to be removed for intential misrepresentation.How can the manufacturer not know....?

reviews.title: Small Device, Large Storage, Hassle Free - GREAT PRICE
reviews.content: First and foremost, the images I have uploaded are more for those wondering about size. The phone case being used is a iPhone SE (2020) version phone case, which is already a small phone size when compared to regular iphones.This device is SMALL. I was expecting something a bit bigger and was caught off guard. That's my fault for not reading the product description. Other than that, it's discreet, easy to travel with as it can fit in my wallet. Hassle-free. Plugged into my Windows 10 device and was recognized immediately without need to format.There is software pre-loaded onto the flash drive, which you can install if you want. When you plug the dice in, you are not prompted to install the software. You can delete the software, I did that, and had no issues. The device is USB 3.0, and it is FAST. Probably MY fastest flash drive I've used in a while.Overall here are my feelings on this.1. Price is fantastic at $102. Storage space is great3. Small, discreet and easy to travel with4. FAST5. Hassle FreeGreat product from SanDisk and would purchase more if needed.

reviews.title: Tiny Storage, Tiny Size!
reviews.content: Bought this to copy screenshots and videos off my PS5! At first I could not copy several videos, says files over 4GB not allowed. Tried formatting it to exfat, exfat is the default along with NFTS. Finally got it to copy after switching from NFTS (Unsupported for PS5) back to exfat. Had 2 videos one about 5 gigs, another 7 gigs, took around or less than 10 minutes to copy. Was using 2.0 before this, upgraded for the 3.0 and faster write speeds.The item itself is very small and light, does not retract, just plug and use. It’s tiny, compared to my 2.0 usb drive, not as bulky. The extra storage is a plus too! From 32 to 64 (57.2 actually) Would recommend.

reviews.title: Nice 3.0 usb for the price
reviews.content: Very good performance and storage capacity at a reasonable price compared to others that are cheaper but don't have the same quality and data security and reliability level.  I use it for backup security camera footage, and there are no speed or file storage issues.  Nice product would buy again.

reviews.title: It works I like the Red
reviews.content: at this point in time I am experiencing no overheating or any other problem it worked great for me also I have used this company many many times and never had an issue with them it's a little smaller than I expected But that's just who cares that's just being funny also this company is well known and no issues

reviews.title: Works well from a trusted, reputable brand
reviews.content: I got this for backups and it works well. I have noticed that it heats up quite a bit though. I'm not worried about it, but it's warm to the touch when in use. Keep in mind this is not USB C so you may need an adapter.
